metadata.name: PktMon.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of PktMon, a tool that captures network packets.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pktmon.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('pktmon.exe'))

output.summary: Detects execution of PktMon, a tool that captures network packets.
